Entries.MovieInvite_{{Loe2run.ChildToNPC/FirstCh: This is going to be so much fun!$1#$b#I wounder what's playing.
Entries.MovieInvite_{{Loe2run.ChildToNPC/SecondC: You're taking me to the movies?$#b#Sounds fun.$1

Entries.{{Loe2run.ChildToNPC/FirstChildName}}: Look Daddy^Look Mommy!#$b#I found an egg already. I'm so going to win.#$b#%You have to wait for Mayor Lewis to say start hunny.#$b#...But... I...$2
%{{Loe2run.ChildToNPC/FirstChildName}} is practicing dance moves from a video game that has nothing to do with dancing. Please stop them!
%{{Loe2run.ChildToNPC/FirstChildName}} fell asleep before the moonlight jellies arrived. Poor thing.
I don't have money for the fishing game.$2#$b#At least the petting zoo is free, and the piggies are cute.
%{{Loe2run.ChildToNPC/FirstChildName}} is trying to give the cat some ham.
So many fishies!#$b#I want to catch them all!$1
I love all the thing you got me, but a secret gift giver is so exciting.#$b#I wonder who it is?

{{Random:~Rain rain go away~$0#$b#~Come again another day~, ~It's raining it's pouring the old man is snoring~#$b#~He bumped his head then went to bed and didn't get up til morning~$0, ~Doo-doo-doot doo~#$b#~Just singin' in the rain.~, ~Pitter patter raindrops, pitter patter raindrops~}}
{{Random:Yoba sounds angry.$s, EEK!#$b#I don't like lightning!$s, The storm is so loud.$s}}

Entries.spring_1_2: Happy new year daddy.^Happy new year mommy.
Entries.spring_8_2: Tulips are so pretty.#$b#Granny Evelyn thinks so, too.
Entries.spring_10_2: Can we visit Vincent today?#$b#It's his birthday.#$e#I hope there's {{Random:pink cake, chocolate cake, ice cream, cupcakes}}.
Entries.spring_13_2: EGGS, EGGS, EGGS!#$b#I'm going to find all the eggs this year.
Entries.spring_23_2: Daddy look, there's so many flowers.^Mommy look, there's so many flowers.#$b#I can't wait for tomorrow.
Entries.spring_24_2: I'm going to be the flower Queen!
Entries.spring_25_2: No one asked me to dance yesterday.$2
Entries.summer_1_2: It's finally summer!$1#$b#I'm going to spend so much time on the beach.$0
Entries.summer_4_2: It's Jas's birthday today.#$e#We're going to play at the ranch and then the beach to celebrate.
Entries.summer_28_2: I wanna see the moonlight jellies tonight.#$b#I promise I wont fall asleep.
Entries.fall_1_2: I fell asleep and missed the jellfish.$s
Entries.fall_16_2: Hurry Up Daddy!^Hurry Up Mommy!#$b#I wanna play the fishing game!
Entries.fall_27_2: BOO!#$b#Haha, I'm scary.$h#$b#Great-Grandpa even said so.
Entries.wintr_1_2: SNOW! Daddy, there's snow.^SNOW! Mommy, there's snow.#$b#Can we build a snowman together?
Entries.winter_8_2: I wanna join the competition, but I don't have a fishing rod.#$b#You also haven't taught me how to fish yet...
Entries.winter_24_2: Don't forget to leave out milk and cookies daddy.^Don't forget to leave out milk and cookies mommy.
Entries.winter_25_2: He came! He came!$1#$b#I got a doll that looks just like me!$1
Entries.winter_28_2: ~For Auld Lang Syne, my dear. For Auld Lang Syne~#$b#~We'll take a cup of kindness yet, for the sake of Auld Lang Syne~
Entries.Mon10: Hi daddy!$1^Hi mommy!$1#$b#I love you so much!$1
Entries.Tue: {{Random:~Mary had a little lamb~#$b#~Little lamb Little lamb~, ~Old McDonald had a farm E I E I O~, ~Baa baa black sheep have you any wool?~#$b#~Yes sir yes sir three bags full~, ~The farmer's in his den. The farmer's in his den~, ~The sheep’s in the meadow. The cow’s in the corn.~}}
Entries.Wed: I saw {{Random:a unicorn in the forest, a mermaid on the beach, a UFO last night, a witch flying over the mountains, a dragon in the distance, something moving in the sewers, a fairy near the crops, a leprechaun on a train, a pink sheep, a doggy in town}}!$1
Entries.Thu: When I grow up, I'm going to be {{Random:a farmer, a fisher, a sailor, a pilot, an adventurer, a rancher, a teacher, a mayor, a wizard, an artist, an author, a scientist, a doctor, a miner, a circus clown, a fortune teller, a reporter, an animator, a game developer, a web designer, a carpenter, a nurse, a train conductor, a movie star, an astronaut, a fire fighter, a ploice officer, a soldier, just like you}}!
Entries.Fri: %What did you do at school this week, {{Loe2run.ChildToNPC/FirstChildName}}?#$b#{{Random:We did lots of math problems, We read a story about a princess knight that slayed an evil lich, We practiced writing, I played with Jas and Vincent the whole time, We learned about the planets in the solar system, Nothing really. I was boared the whole time}}.
Entries.Sat: Saturday morning cartoons are the best.#$b#Especially the ones when {{Random:the adults from other cartoons are kids, kids team up with friendly monsters to fight the bad guys, animal's act like people, superheroes save the day}}.
Entries.Sun: Yay! I get to pick dinner tonight.$1#$b# I want... {{Random:pepper poppers, pumpkin pie, blackberry cobbler, round fruit, breakfast, chocolate cake, pink cake, milk and cookies, ice cream, steaks, BBQ ribs, spaghetti and meatballs, cheeseburgers, pizza, tacos, fried chicken, breadcrumb porkchops, chicken noodle soup}}$4.

Changes.LogName: Firstchild Dialogue edit Shane's litle girl

Entries.winter_25_2: He came! He came!$1#$b#I got a doll that looks just like me and a little blue chick!$1#$b#Daddy said I can keep her in his chicken coop until I can get my own.

Changes.LogName: Firstchild Dialogue edit Penny's litle girl

Entries.winter_25_2: He came! He came!$1#$b#I got a doll that looks just like me and a book of fairy tales!$1.

Changes.LogName: Firstchild Dialogue edit Leah's litle girl

Entries.winter_25_2: He came! He came!$1#$b#I got a doll that looks just like me and an art kit!$1.#$b#I'm going to draw so many animals!

Changes.LogName: Firstchild Dialogue edit Haley's litle girl

Entries.winter_25_2: He came! He came!$1#$b#I got a doll that looks just like me, matching outfits for me and her, and a bunch of make-up!$1

Changes.LogName: Firstchild Dialogue edit Elliott's litle girl

Entries.winter_25_2: He came! He came!$1#$b#I got a doll that looks just like me and a really cute notebook!$1#$b#Now I can write stories just like daddy.

Entries.school.000: It's not fare.$3#$b#The weather is so nice.#$b#Why can't we go outside and play?
Entries.school.001: I'm glad there's air conditioning here.#$b#Why don't we have that at home?
Entries.school.003: It's so cold in here.#$b#Can you ask Gunther to turn the heat up?
Entries.forest.001: Vincent said chocolate milk comes from brown cows, but Jas said that's not true.
Entries.winter.001: ~~Oh Winter Tree~ ~Oh Winter Tree~~#$b#~~Your Starlight Is So Pretty~~$h
Entries.beach.002: %{{Loe2run.ChildToNPC/FirstChildName}} is playing in the tide pools.
Entries.town.001: There's so many fish!#$b#Can you catch one daddy?^Can you catch one mommy?#$b#Then we can keep it as a pet in a fish pond.$1
Entries.town.002: Can I have an ice cream please?#$b#With sprinkles.$1
Entries.samhouse.001: %{{Loe2run.ChildToNPC/FirstChildName}} is playing with Vincent's toys. Looks fun
Entries.summit.000: *Huff* We made *Huff* it to the top!*Huff*^
Entries.afterschool.000: I'm going to spend some time with Vincent.
Entries.afterschool.001: I'm going to spend some time with Jas.

Entries.{{Loe2run.ChildToNPC/SecondChildName}}: Why does Mr. Pierre not sell strawberry seeds in his shop?#$b#I asked him, but he said it's a trade secret.$3
Ms. Marnie stopped me putting stuff in the pot.$2#$b#She's not a fan of stones.$1
Aunt Marnie is showing me how to properly stir a pot this big.#$b#She said something about keeping the family tradition alive?.
It's amazing the jellies travel the whole ocean, but can still find their way back to Pelican Beach on the same day year after year, never late or getting lost.
Ms. Penny and Jas are showing me how to make a snowman.
Mom and Jas are showing me how to make a snowman.
{{Loe2run.ChildToNPC/FirstChildName}} doesn't like the sound of rain, so she tries to sing louder then it.#$b#I'd rather hear the rain then her singing.
{{Loe2run.ChildToNPC/FirstChildName}} doesn't like the sound of rain, so he tries to sing louder then it.#$b#I'd rather hear the rain then his singing.

Entries.Mon: Hey dad?^Hey mom?#$b#Can you teach me how to {{Random:keep bees, plant crops, use the stove, swim, chop a tree, use a slingshot, fish, ride a horse, start a fire, build a chest, pan for metal, milk a cow, shear a sheep, hunt}}?
Entries.Tue: {{Random:Why is the sky blue, Where do raindows come from, Why are there spots on the moon, Are ghosts real, When is grandma and grandpa coming to visit, Why do we need to sleep, How big is space, Where does the sun go at night, What are clouds made of, Are there aliens}}?
Entries.Wed: {{Random:The man that lives in a tent up the mountain smells weird..., Ms.Marnie smells a lot like a cow, Mr.Kent is kind of scary, Mr.Willy stinks of fish. Yuck, %pet got sprayed by a skunk and needs a bath}}.
Entries.Thu: {{Random:I love living on %farm farm.#$b#It's really quiet.#$b#Except for {{Loe2run.ChildToNPC/FirstChildName}} of course., {{Loe2run.ChildToNPC/FirstChildName}} is picking on me.$s, {{Loe2run.ChildToNPC/FirstChildName}} took my library book and wont give it back!$2}}
Entries.Sat: I get to choose what we have for dinner?$3#$b#Ummm... {{Random:pepper poppers, pumpkin pie, blackberry cobbler, round fruit, breakfast, chocolate cake, pink cake, milk and cookies, ice cream, steaks, BBQ ribs, spaghetti and meatballs, cheeseburgers, pizza, tacos, fried chicken, breadcrumb porkchops, chicken noodle soup}}?
Entries.spring_1_2: All the snow melted away over night.$s
Entries.spring_13_2: Why are Straberry Seeds only sold today?#$b#%You have to ask Pierre to get the answer.#$b#Oh, Okay then.$3
Entries.spring_24_2: I don't want to dance, but there's Gelatin that jiggles.#$b#So can I please go this time?$2
Entries.summer_11_2: Can we add {{Random:Starfruit, Blobfish, Lava Eel, Goat Cheese, Large Goat Milk}} to the pot this year?#$b#Normal quality is good, but silver would be perfect.
Entries.summer_28_2: Can I come to the beach tonight?#$b# The jellies sound really cool.
Entries.fall_16_2: I can't wait for Mr. Gus's all you can eat BBQ Ribs.#$b#Your cooking is good, but his is better.
Entries.fall_27_2: The maze sounds really scary.#$b# Is there really monsters in it?
Entries.winter_8_2: Good luck fishing on ice daddy.^Good luck fishing on ice mommy.#$b#I'll cheer you on from solid ground.
Entries.winter_25_2: Thank you daddy^Thank you mommy.#$b#I love my new ball.$1

Changes.LogName: secondchild Dialogue NOT married to Daddy!

Entries.fall_7_2: Daddy, why does other daddy not live with us?$s^Mommy, why does daddy not live with us?$s
Entries.spring_7_2: Daddy, where's other daddy?$s^Mommy, where's daddy?$s#$b#Did I do something to make him leave?$s

Entries.fall_7_2: Daddy, why does mommy not live with us?$s^Mommy, why does other mommy not live with us?$s
Entries.spring_7_2: Daddy, where's mommy?$s^Mommy, where's other mommy?$s#$b#Did I do something to make her leave?$s

Entries.fall_7_2: I love my two dad's so much!$h^I love you and dad so much!$h

Entries.mountain.000: I'm not doing anything.$2#$b#Those rocks were already on the tent, I swear.$2
Entries.towneast.000: This would be a really great spot for a small house and garden.#$b#Maybe when I'm bigger, I can build a house of my own here.
Entries.garden.000: %{{Loe2run.ChildToNPC/SecondChildName}} is making sure the community garden is healthy.
Entries.gameing.000: %{{Loe2run.ChildToNPC/SecondChildName}} is pretending to play, but it's just the video on loop.#$b#%Atleast she's having fun.
